title: The Great Alchemical Transmutation
flavor_text: The surplus of gold throughout the lands has caused a magical imbalance, threatening to tear the veil between worlds. The Royal Alchemists require vast quantities of gold to fuel a ritual that will stabilize the realm's essence and restore the value of every copper piece.
objective: Contribute 1,000,000 gold pieces to the Alchemical Furnaces in any major city.
reward: Exclusive 'Aurelian Wings' vanity item and the prestigious title 'Exalted Stabilizer'.
